message:
LOG4J2-219: don't ignore configured named loggers if root logger is not configured and a default root logger is installed. Improved docs.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/logging/log4j/log4j2/trunk@1479072 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

added: LOGGER.warn("No Root logger was configured, creating default ERROR-level Root logger with Console appender");
// return; // LOG4J2-219: creating default root=ok, but don't exclude configured Loggers
deleted: LOGGER.warn("No Root logger was configured, using default");
